entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Decide on the bar for IDE suggestions and refactorings offered for code style (IDE analyzers) and quality (CA analyzers) #47269
    Backlog
  • Handling version mismatch and exceptions in DiagnosticDataSerializer #47801
    Backlog
  • Async lightbulb performance improvements #56843
    17.1

Updated

  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString throws NullReferenceException in SymbolDisplayVisitor #53943
    17.1
  • `JsonSourceGenerator` is Executing in Both `ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe` and `devenv.exe` #55723
    Backlog
  • Improve file structure view #36812
    Backlog
  • Improve .NET Productivity inner-loop performance #58268
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58412
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58411
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58410
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1520547 #58374
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Fix leak in _hostAnalyzerStateMap #58406
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Update Public API files #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
